ygData.subject: Level 14 mobs do drop components
ygData.msgSnippet: I was on kerra isle killing wisps and an erudite madman (wizard) was tromping about and conned yellow to me, and since I m level 13, he s level 14.  After some
ygData.messageBody:
I was on kerra isle killing wisps and an erudite madman (wizard) was
tromping about and conned yellow to me, and since I'm level 13, he's level
14. After some help and a lay on hands from a friend, we killed him. I
totally didn't expect a component cause all I read about is only on 16+,
but I got page 24 of Tarishn's Grimoire (dunno if I spelled that one right).

Azboklin the enchanter
